System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=false, Inherited=true)

summary.span: 指定二進位 XAML (BAML) 類別或類別成員的當地語系化屬性。

span.span: Specifies the localization attributes for a binary XAML (BAML) class or class member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以套用至類別、 屬性或方法。This attribute can be applied to a class, property, or method. 如需有關如何使用當地語系化屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 當地語系化屬性和註解](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md)。For more information on how to use localization attributes, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory category) cil managed

summary.span: 使用指定的當地語系化分類，初始化 類別的新執行個體 (Instance)。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified localization category.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Category As LocalizationCategory
public: property System::Windows::LocalizationCategory Category { System::Windows::LocalizationCategory get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得當地語系化屬性之目標值的分類設定。

span.span: Gets the category setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.

value.span: 當地語系化屬性的分類設定。

span.span: The category setting of the localization attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示當地語系化屬性的可修改性設定。The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute. |分類設定Category setting|意義Meaning| |----------------------|-------------| ||資源不屬於標準分類。Resource does not belong to a standard category.| ||冗長的描述性文字。A lengthy piece of descriptive text.| ||單行文字，例如標題。A single line of text, such as a title.| ||簡短文字字串，例如控制標籤。A short text string, such as a control label.| || 或相關的控制項。A or related control.| || 或相關的控制項。A or related control.| ||A或相關控制項，例如。A or related control, such as .| ||A或相關控制項，例如。A or related control, such as .| ||A或相關控制項，例如。A or related control, such as .| || 或相關的控制項。A or related control.| || 或相關的控制項。A or related control.| || 或相關的控制項。A or related control.| ||A或另一個面板可以包含文字。A or other panel that can contain text.| ||[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] 資料。data.| ||字型相關資料，例如字型家族、 字型樣式或字型大小。Font-related data such as font family, font style, or font size.| ||類別會繼承父節點。Inherits category from parent node.| ||請勿將此資源當地語系化。Do not localize this resource. 這不適用於資源的任何子節點。This does not apply to any child nodes of the resource.| ||不使用這項資源，或任何分類設定為子節點當地語系化。Do not localize this resource, or any of its child nodes whose category is set to .| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示為按鈕定義當地語系化屬性的類別目錄設定。The following code example shows the category settings of localization attributes defined for a button. [!code-xaml[AttributesSnippets#AttributesSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AttributesSnippets/CSharp/Attributes.xaml#attributessnippet1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定當地語系化屬性之目標值的可修改性設定。

span.span: Gets or sets the modifiability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.

value.span: 當地語系化屬性的可修改性設定。

span.span: The modifiability setting of the localization attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示當地語系化屬性的可修改性設定。The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute. |可修改性設定Modifiability setting|意義Meaning| |---------------------------|-------------| ||當地語系化者可修改目標值。Targeted value is modifiable by localizers.| ||當地語系化者無法修改目標值。Targeted value is not modifiable by localizers.| ||目標的值的可修改性繼承自其父節點。Targeted value's modifiability is inherited from its parent node.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示為按鈕定義當地語系化屬性的可修改性設定。The following code example shows the modifiability setting of localization attributes defined for a button. [!code-xaml[AttributesSnippets#AttributesSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AttributesSnippets/CSharp/Attributes.xaml#attributessnippet1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定當地語系化屬性之目標值的可讀性設定。

span.span: Gets or sets the readability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.

value.span: 當地語系化屬性的可讀性設定。

span.span: The readability setting of the localization attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示當地語系化屬性的可讀性設定。The following table shows the readability settings of the localization attribute. |可讀性設定Readability setting|意義Meaning| |-------------------------|-------------| ||目標值為可讀取的文字。Targeted value is readable text.| ||目標值無法讀取。Targeted value is not readable.| ||目標的值可讀性繼承自其父節點。Targeted value's readability is inherited from its parent node.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示為文字區塊定義當地語系化屬性的可讀性設定。The following code example shows the readability setting of localization attributes defined for a text block. [!code-xaml[AttributesSnippets#AttributesSnippet4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AttributesSnippets/CSharp/Comments.xaml#attributessnippet4)]
